item.title: 国际货币基金组织敦促中国加快结构性改革并上调经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周三敦促中国加快结构性改革，因为全球对这个世界第二大经济体施加的压力越来越大，要求它转向消费主导型增长模式，控制债务驱动型投资和出口。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Wednesday urged China to speed up structural reform, as global pressure mounts on the world's second-largest economy to shift to a consumption-led growth model and rein in debt-driven investment and exports.】

item.title: 韩国将考虑设立价值 31 亿美元的芯片代工厂，以发展本地芯片产业
item.description: 韩国工业部表示，韩国正在考虑建设一个 4.5 万亿韩元（约合 30.6 亿美元）的芯片代工厂，由国家和私人投资提供资金，努力确保韩国继续成为半导体强国。【原文：South Korea is considering building a 4.5 trillion won ($3.06 billion) foundry to manufacture chips, funded by state and private investment, the industry ministry said, amid efforts to ensure the country remains a powerhouse in semiconductors.】

item.title: 在线零售商遭遇大规模数据泄露，Coupang 首席执行官辞职
item.description: 韩国最大的在线零售商 Coupang 周三表示，首席执行官朴大俊（Park Dae-jun）已经辞职，对公司发生的巨大数据泄露事件负责，该事件在亚洲第四大经济体引发了越来越大的反弹。【原文：South Korea's biggest online retailer Coupang said on Wednesday that CEO Park Dae-jun has resigned, taking responsibility for a huge data breach at the company that has triggered a growing backlash in Asia's fourth-largest economy.】

item.title: 早间竞价：美联储会议前，茫然的日元成为焦点
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 亚马逊宣布在印度投资 350 亿美元
item.description: 美国电子商务巨头亚马逊周三表示，计划到2030年在印度投资350多亿美元，以扩大业务和加强人工智能能力，成为在世界上人口最多的国家深化业务的最新一家全球科技公司。【原文：Amazon plans to invest more than $35 billion in India by 2030 to expand operations and strengthen its artificial intelligence capabilities, the U.S. e-commerce giant said on Wednesday, becoming the latest global tech firm to deepen its presence in the world's most populous country.】

item.title: 这是终结"：澳大利亚青少年哀悼社交媒体禁令开始后的损失
item.description: 澳大利亚青少年最后一次在社交媒体上与他们的追随者告别，并悼念在本周三全球首例禁令生效之前影响了他们大部分生活的平台的消失。【原文：Australian teenagers have taken to social media for the last time to farewell their followers and mourn the loss of the platforms that shaped much of their lives before a world-first ban took effect on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：英伟达打造位置验证技术，助力打击芯片走私
item.description: 据熟知内情的消息人士透露，英伟达（Nvidia）已经建立了位置验证技术，可以显示其芯片在哪个国家运行，此举有助于防止其人工智能芯片被走私到禁止出口的国家。【原文：Nvidia has built location verification technology that could indicate which country its chips are operating in, according to sources familiar with the matter, a move that could help prevent its artificial intelligence chips from being smuggled into countries where their export is banned.】

item.title: 报告发现欧盟在华企业加速供应链多元化
item.description: 中国欧盟商会周三表示，随着中国政府的自力更生运动和出口管制加深了全球贸易的不确定性，欧洲企业正在加快从中国供应链向多元化发展的步伐。【原文：European firms are accelerating efforts to diversify away from Chinese supply chains as Beijing's self-reliance drive and export controls deepen global trade uncertainty, the European Union Chamber of Commerce in China said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚洲投资者涌向海湾地区债务，寻求收益和增长
item.description: 今年，亚洲投资者纷纷涌入海湾地区的债券和贷款市场，这既反映了与这个快速增长地区的贸易和金融联系不断加深，也反映了包括世界前两大经济体美国和中国在内的其他地区的不确定前景。【原文：Asian investors are piling into Gulf bonds and loans this year, reflecting both deepening trade and finance ties with the fast-growing region and an uncertain outlook elsewhere, including the world's top two economies, the United States and China.】

item.title: 莱因哈特：过度监管危及澳大利亚矿业竞争力
item.description: 女矿业男爵吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）周三表示，过度监管给澳大利亚采矿业带来的负担已危及其全球竞争力。【原文：Mining baroness Gina Rinehart said on Wednesday the burden of excessive regulation on the Australian mining industry has put its global competitiveness at risk.】

item.title: 中国公司如何在美国加征关税之际进军越南
item.description: 中国企业正在越南扩张，引领投资流入，并向河内运送创纪录的货物，无视美国要求脱钩的呼吁，因为这两个共产党邻国正在加强联系。【原文：Chinese firms are expanding in Vietnam, leading investment inflows and sending record shipments to Hanoi in defiance of U.S. calls for decoupling, as the Communist neighbours beef up ties.】

item.title: 供应担忧抑制涨幅，市场关注乌克兰和谈，石油价格持稳
item.description: 周三，油价在上一交易日下跌约1%后持稳，原因是对供应超过需求的担忧抑制了油价的涨幅，投资者也在关注俄乌和谈的进展。【原文：Oil prices held steady on Wednesday after falling about 1% in the previous session, as concerns over supply outpacing demand capped gains and investors watched for progress in Russia-Ukraine peace talks.】

item.title: Venture Global 在液化天然气仲裁战中回击壳牌的欺诈指控
item.description: 本周二晚些时候，Venture Global 公司就壳牌石油公司在液化天然气货物仲裁案中败诉提出的法律质疑提交了答复，拒绝接受欺诈指控，并指责壳牌石油公司违反仲裁保密规定。【原文：Venture Global submitted its response late on Tuesday to a legal challenge from Shell over the oil major's defeat in an arbitration case concerning liquefied natural gas cargoes, rejecting allegations of fraud and accusing Shell of breaching arbitration confidentiality.】

item.title: 美联储降息已成定局，指引尚不明朗，亚洲股市趋于缓和
item.description: 周三，随着美联储政策委员会意见分歧的关键时刻临近，以及财报可能对人工智能领域的天价估值造成考验，亚洲股市和华尔街期货下跌。【原文：Asian shares and Wall Street futures gave ground on Wednesday as crunch time neared for a divided Federal Reserve policy board, and earnings results threatened to test sky-high valuations in the AI space.】

item.title: 澳大利亚社交媒体监管机构与美国达成共识，开始实施年龄禁令
item.description: 负责监管澳大利亚全球首个青少年社交媒体禁令的监管机构拒绝接受主要由美国平台倡导的 "技术例外论"，并表示美国家长也希望采取类似措施。【原文：The regulator overseeing Australia's world-first teenage social media ban rejected the "technological exceptionalism" championed by mostly U.S.-based platforms and said a groundswell of American parents wanted similar measures.】

item.title: GE Vernova 与美国政府合作增加稀土钇库存
item.description: 燃气轮机制造商通用电气弗诺瓦公司首席执行官斯科特-斯特拉兹克（Scott Strazik）周二表示，由于中国对稀土元素的出口管制导致能源、航空航天和半导体等领域的稀土短缺，该公司正与美国政府合作增加稀土钇的库存。【原文：Gas turbine maker GE Vernova is working with the U.S. government to increase its stockpiles of the rare earth yttrium, CEO Scott Strazik said on Tuesday, as China's export controls of the vital element create shortages across energy, aerospace and semiconductors.】

item.title: 中国 11 月消费通胀加快，生产通缩持续
item.description: 周三的官方数据显示，中国11月份的年度消费通胀加速，而生产通缩持续存在，因为政策制定者扩大了抑制产能过剩的行动。【原文：China's annual consumer inflation accelerated in November while producer deflation persisted, official data showed on Wednesday, as policymakers extended their campaign to curb overcapacity.】

item.title: 罗利建筑公司 Cardinal Infrastructure 在美国首次公开募股中筹集约 2.415 亿美元资金
item.description: 建筑服务提供商卡迪纳尔基础设施集团（Cardinal Infrastructure Group）周二表示，该公司在美国首次公开募股中筹集了约 2.415 亿美元。【原文：Construction services provider Cardinal Infrastructure Group said on Tuesday it has raised about $241.5 million in its initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 司法部公布对俄罗斯支持的网络攻击指控的新罪名
item.description: 美国司法部周二公布了对一名乌克兰人的额外联邦刑事指控，该人被控参与网络攻击和其他针对关键基础设施的计算机入侵，以支持俄罗斯的利益。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department on Tuesday unveiled additional federal criminal charges against a Ukrainian national accused of participating in cyberattacks and other computer intrusions against key infrastructure in support of Russian interests.】

item.title: 美联储倒计时，日元疲软，美元持稳
item.description: 日元在隔夜突然暴跌后，在周三显得醉醺醺的，日本与世界其他国家之间的巨大利率差给日元带来了压力，即使人们普遍预期日本央行将在下周收紧政策。【原文：The yen looked punch-drunk on Wednesday after a sudden spill overnight, pressured by wide interest rate differentials between Japan and the rest of the world even as its central bank is widely expected to tighten policy next week.】

item.title: 美国官员称美国与印尼的贸易协议面临破裂风险
item.description: 一位美国官员周二表示，由于雅加达在作为协议一部分所做的几项承诺上出现了反悔，美国与印尼在七月份达成的贸易协议面临着破裂的风险。【原文：A U.S. trade agreement reached with Indonesia in July is at risk of collapsing because Jakarta has backtracked on several commitments it made as part of the deal, a U.S. official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加拿大横贯航空与飞行员工会达成避免罢工的临时协议
item.description: 加拿大休闲航空公司横贯航空（Air Transat）及其飞行员工会周二表示，他们已达成一项临时协议，承诺提高薪酬并改善工作条件，从而避免了可能发生的罢工，使运营恢复正常。【原文：Canadian leisure carrier Air Transat and its pilots' union said on Tuesday they had reached a tentative deal that promised higher pay and better working conditions, averting a potential strike and allowing operations to return to normal.】

item.title: 监管机构 Ofcom 称，英国人每天观看 YouTube 的时间为 51 分钟
item.description: 监管机构 Ofcom 表示，2025 年，英国人平均每天在智能手机、平板电脑和个人电脑上观看 YouTube 的时间为 51 分钟，并指出，YouTube 所有者 Alphabet 和 Meta 提供的服务占所有上网时间的一半以上。【原文：Britons watched YouTube on average for 51 minutes a day in 2025 on smartphones, tablets and PCs, regulator Ofcom said, noting that services from its owner Alphabet and from Meta account for more than half of all time spent online.】

item.title: 三星 SDI 部门签署价值超过 13.6 亿美元的美国电池交易，用于储能系统
item.description: 韩国三星 SDI 周三表示，其部门三星 SDI 美国公司已经签署了一项协议，将向一家美国客户提供磷酸铁锂（LFP）电池，用于能源储存系统，这引发了该公司股价的大幅上涨。【原文：South Korea's Samsung SDI said on Wednesday that its unit Samsung SDI America has signed a deal to supply lithium iron phosphate (LFP) batteries to a U.S. customer for energy storage systems, triggering a sharp rally in its shares.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国与印度尼西亚的贸易协议面临破裂风险
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周二援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）认为雅加达正在对其做出的几项承诺 "开倒车"，印尼与美国的贸易协议面临崩溃的危险。【原文：Indonesia's trade deal with the United States is in danger of collapsing, with U.S. trade representative Jamieson Greer believing Jakarta is "backtracking" on several commitments it made, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: MUFG 顶级银行高管称市场对日本的 "负面螺旋 "风险感到焦虑
item.description: 顶级贷款机构三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group）的市场主管表示，市场越来越担心日本陷入负螺旋的 "尾部风险"，即货币紧缩滞后于通胀，日元疲软推高物价。【原文：Markets are increasingly worried about Japan's "tail risk" of slipping into a negative spiral, where monetary tightening lags inflation and a weak yen pushes prices higher, the markets chief at top lender Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group said.】

item.title: 迪士尼提名苹果公司前首席运营官进入董事会
item.description: 迪士尼周二表示，已提名苹果公司前首席运营官杰夫-威廉姆斯（Jeff Williams）为独立董事候选人，参加 2026 年年度股东大会的选举。【原文：Disney said on Tuesday it has nominated former Apple Chief Operating Officer Jeff Williams as an independent director candidate for election at its 2026 annual shareholders' meeting.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表格里尔表示，他对根据非洲贸易倡议 "区别对待 "南非持开放态度
item.description: 美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）周二表示，如果美国延长与撒哈拉以南非洲地区于今年九月到期的贸易倡议，他愿意将南非与其他非洲国家区别对待。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer on Tuesday said he was open to treating South Africa differently than other African countries if the U.S. extends a trade initiative with sub-Saharan Africa that expired in September.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特朗普将于本周启动最后一轮美联储主席面试
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周二报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将很快启动美联储主席的最后一轮面试。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will soon launch a final round of interviews for Federal Reserve chair, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 交易日：紧张的美联储守夜即将结束
item.description: 周二，美国股市、债券和美元相对持稳，投资者正在为美联储周三的政策决定做准备，而澳大利亚央行行长出人意料的鹰派言论则震撼了当地市场。【原文：U.S. stocks, bonds and the dollar held relatively steady on Tuesday as investors braced for the Federal Reserve's policy decision on Wednesday, while surprisingly hawkish remarks from Australia's central bank governor rocked markets there.】
